paper_abstract: It is well known that every Del Pezzo surface of degree 5 defined over a field k is parametrizable over k. In this paper, we give an algorithm for parametrizing, as well as algorithms for constructing examples in every isomorphism class and for deciding equivalence. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Algorithms for Del Pezzo surfaces of degree 5 (construction, parametrization)
